General.Name: Shaanxi Baoguang Vacuum Electronic Apparatus Co Ltd
General.Description: Shaanxi Baoguang Vacuum Electric Device Co., Ltd. produces and sells vacuum interrupters and vacuum switch equipment in China. The company offers electric vacuum device products such as empty arc interrupter, solid-sealed pole column, phase column and solar collector tube; electrical accessories plate; electronic ceramic plate; import of metallized porcelain shells; and energy storage and hydrogen energy products under the Baoguang brand name. It is also involved in import and export business of gas machinery and equipment; production and sales of gas; and smart grid technical services. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Baoji, China. .
